function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sensory input in online shopping preventing customers from getting a complete shopping experience.","Impact":"Reduced customer satisfaction and engagement, lower conversion rates.","Mitigation":"Enhance online shopping experience with virtual reality technology, provide detailed product descriptions and interactive content.","Technologies":"Virtual reality, interactive content, 3D product visualization.","People":"Online consumers","Owner":"Online retailers"},{"Description":"Lack of a warm, human touch (social presence) during online interactions.","Impact":"Reduced emotional connection, lower trust and satisfaction.","Mitigation":"Implement chatbots or virtual assistance to simulate human interaction, personalize customer interactions and communication.","Technologies":"Chatbots, virtual assistance, personalization algorithms.","People":"Online consumers","Owner":"Online retailers"},{"Description":"Webshops not considered pleasant 'places' to visit, leading to a lack of experiential value online.","Impact":"Low customer retention, decreased brand loyalty.","Mitigation":"Enhance webshop design with visual appeal, interactive features, and personalized recommendations.","Technologies":"Web design, personalization algorithms, interactive features.","People":"Online consumers","Owner":"Online retailers"}]}
